text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the county where the project is located shall maintain every stormwater management system and part of every system that:
Was constructed by the Commission or the county or accepted for maintenance by the Commission or the county; and
Is located in a street, alley, public way, or public space.

Unless the county agrees otherwise:
A stormwater management system that is located on real property owned by the Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission shall be maintained by the Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission; and
A stormwater management system or facility that is located in a road maintained by the State Highway Administration shall be maintained by the State.
